cmput301w18t22.com.tenner

Class Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmput301w18t22.com.tenner.Task

  • public class Task
extends java.lang.Object
    The Task class represents a task that has been requested. Each task has a taskID, status (one of assigned, bidded, requested, or done), title, description, requestedDate, and requester. Optionally, a task may have a location and one or more photos.

    Once requested, a task can acquire bids, and the requester can select a provider based on the bids.
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    Team 22
    See Also:
    Bid, Location

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Task.Status
      Represents the four possible statuses: requested (initial status), bidded (once a provider has bid on a task), assigned (once the requester has accepted a bid on that task), and done (once the requester marks the task complete.

      • removeBid

        public void removeBid(Bid bid)
        Remove a specific bid from this task. Either because the provider removed it, the requester rejected it, or the requester rejected a different bid.
        Parameters:
        bid - bid to be removed

      • setDescription

        public void setDescription(java.lang.String description)
        Set the description of this task. Must eventually enforce a ~300 character limit.
        Parameters:
        description - String representing description to set

      • setHasNewBids

        public void setHasNewBids(java.lang.Boolean hasNewBids)
        Set has new bids boolean. If hasNewBids is equal to 1, the task requester will be notified, and hasNewBids will be restore to 0 once they see the notification.
        Parameters:
        hasNewBids - Boolean representing new hasNewBids value

      • setLocation

        public void setLocation(Location location)
        Set the location of this task.
        Parameters:
        location - Location object belonging to this task.

      • setPhotos

        public void setPhotos(java.util.ArrayList<cmput301w18t22.com.tenner.Photo> photos)
        Set the photos associated with this task. Each must be less than 65536 bytes. Might define a limit of 3 or 5 photos per task.
        Parameters:
        photos - ArrayList of photos to add.

      • setProvider

        public void setProvider(User user)
        Set the provider of this task. Starts as null, and is changed to a user once that user's bid has been accepted by this task's requester.
        Parameters:
        user - User object whose bid has been accepted to provide this task

      • setRequestedDate

        public void setRequestedDate(java.util.Date date)
        Set the requested date of this task.
        Parameters:

        Set the requester of this task.
        Parameters:

      • setStatus

        public void setStatus(Task.Status status)
        Set the status of this task to one of requester, bidded, assigned, or done. This is not an attribute users can change directly, but instead changes after certain events.
        Parameters:
        status - String representing taskID to set

      • setTaskID

        public void setTaskID(java.lang.String taskID)
        Set the ID for this task. To be further defined in the future.
